name: Daniel Rey Cimafranca
text:
Calma. 
 It was offered in exchange for agreeing to bilateral talks.  Wala nman 
tayo napapala sa multilateral talks (ASEAN couldnt agree before on 
Spratlys, so why expect a multilateral talk on 9dash line would be 
productive).  Hindi pa nagsisimula negotiation may pwede na tayo
 pakinbangan, and of course its a loan hindi naman pinamimigay ang 
ganyan kalaki na pera.  China is aware that he'll be around for 
only 6 yrs so they have to be gracious and generous to convince the rest
 of the country of the benefits.  After his term, those who wish to 
renew ties with the Philippines will also be gracious and generous.  And
 China may also try to keep the relationship unlike US handling, so in 6
 yrs time they may continue to do the same.  Win-win so far for that 
aspect.  Time will tell for the other aspects.
